name: PoweRL
description:
Navigate your robot through 8 dungeons, avoiding or destroying enemies and keeping your power supply topped up!

This game was reworked into Power-Q. Play that instead!

Includes an original song and various non-bfxr bleeps and bloops.

I was aiming for an 868-HACK gameplay vibe.

The compo version has a crash I could never reproduce. I fixed it in the post-compo version. If you have trouble, you can play v1.1 (only difference is art) and rate me on the art from 1.0.
